mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE content LIKE '%'|| #{word} ||'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, bseq, title, content, writerId, writeDate FROM (SELECT * FROM board WHERE content LIKE '%'|| #{word} ||'%' ORDER BY bseq DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.pageNumberNow} * #{criteria.numPerPage}) WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNumberNow} - 1) * #{criteria.numPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(bseq, title, content, writerId) VALUES(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE writerId=#{writerId} AND bseq=#{bseq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_rep WHERE bseq=#{bseq}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, replySeq, bseq, replyContent, replyId, replyDate FROM(SELECT * FROM board_rep WHERE bseq=#{bseq} ORDER BY replySeq ASC) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.pageNumberNow} * #{criteria.numPerPage}) WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNumberNow} - 1) * #{criteria.numPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_rep(replySeq, bseq, replyContent, replyId) VALUES(reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{bseq}, #{replyContent}, #{replyId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_rep WHERE replySeq=#{replySeq} AND replyId=#{replyId}
